chapters.title: Chapter 3:  A Dangerous Place
chapters.info: Atal Mishraile, p. 115—One of the Asha'man. He is one of Taim's cronies, and receives special lessons and instructions from him. He is tall, has wavy golden hair, bright blue eyes, wide shoulders, and a “winning” smile that never seems to reach his eyes. He is dimssive of Androl and the other Dedicated who are not on a path to being Taim's cronies. He was on Taim's side from the beginning; there was no need to Turn him, as he is a Darkfriend voluntarily.
